Faridah Àbíké-Íyímídé (amụrụ na 13 Ọktọba 1999) bụ onye Britain na Naịjịrịa na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na-ede akụkọ mkpirikpi na onye na-edekọ akụkọ

Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi ya, ihe na-akpali akpali Ace of Spades (2021), natara NAACP Image Award maka Outstanding Literary Work ➜ Youth/Teens na 2022, wee ruo n'elu iri na ndepụta The New York Times Best Seller
Tụkwasị na nke a, Àbíké-Íyímídé enyewo aka n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche, gụnyere The Bookseller, gal-dem, NME na Reader's Digest

A mụrụ Àbíké-Íyímídé ma zụlite ya na Croydon na South London. Ọ biri na Aberdeen, Scotland mgbe ọ na-amụ Bekee, Chinese na anthropology na Mahadum Aberdeen. Ọ bi na London ugbụ a mgbe ọ na-amụta ihe n'ebe dị anya n'afọ ikpeazụ nke usoro nzere.

Akwụkwọ akụkọ izizi nke Àbíké-Íyímídé, Ace of Spades, bụ ihe na-akpali akpali nke nwere isiokwu nke "homophobia na obodo ndị isi ojii, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na echiche dị ịche ịche n'etiti ndị isi ojii". N'afọ 2018 ọ nwetara onye nnọchi anya na nkwekọrịta akwụkwọ UK maka Ace of Spades na Usborne Publishing. N'afọ 2020, ọ nwetara nkwekọrịta akwụkwọ US na Macmillan Publishers maka Ace of Spades tinyere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ, maka ego asaa.
Àbíké-Íyímídé na-akọwa n'ihu ọha dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike.
